New Records: India won their ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 encounter against Sri Lanka by 302 runs, a World Cup record win for them.
Mohammed Shami finished with 7/57, the best-ever figures for an India bowler in ODIs.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli compiled a superb half-century to rescue India after an early Australia attack at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
Jasprit Bumrah struck late to hold Afghanistan from charging towards 300.
Mohammed Shami’s five-for helped India register a comfortable win against New Zealand with two overs to spare.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage and dominance in the tournament so far.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma’s belligerence and Virat Kohli’s assurance have been the key factors behind India’s success in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have been led by Rohit Sharma’s excellence and Virat Kohli’s assurance throughout the tournament.
India have excelled with both the pacers and spinners thriving in the bowling effort.
Others: India are looking to add a third World Cup to their trophy cabinet, having been led by Rohit Sharma’s belligerence and Virat Kohli’s assurance.
